about_the_game:
This additional content includes:

- Hunter Voice: Bahari

Bahari the Scientist is one of the Kingdom's greatest geniuses. His research skills are second to none, but his hunting prowess leaves a lot to be desired, so what if he was hurled into a quest...? "Huntin' sure takes a lot outta ya, huh?"

Change up your hunter’s sound with this special voice option!

- Voices can be applied by selecting Change Appearance in the Item Box. They can also be used while creating a character.
- This item changes the voice of the character without affecting their stats and abilities.
